text: @realDonaldTrump @MikeGarcia2020 @GavinNewsom Frankly, I can’t find any reason how Donald Trump, Mike Pence and First Lady could escape from the coronavirus when all their aides have been diagnosed positive, especially when no masks and safe distancing practiced.
